categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Garold was a male Human Sith living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was allied with the Mantellian Separatist Movement that relocated to Cademimu V and initiated the Cademimu uprising alongside governor Chornarov. A strike team sent to take control of the Cademimu missile batteries from Chornarov engaged Garold and killed him.
Garold the Dark One appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a challenge boss during the "Cademimu" flashpoint.
